metadata.description: System & Services Acquisition - Supply chain, development lifecycle, security requirements - MAPPED

controls.Name: SA-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document system and services acquisition policy and procedures
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through acquisition management, compliance monitoring, and automation capabilities

controls.Name: SA-2-description - Allocation of Resources

details: Determine high-level security and privacy requirements
Document resource allocation for system protection
Establish discrete line items for security in budgeting
Coordinate with capital planning and investment control

controls.notes: AWS functions support allocation of resources through acquisition management, compliance monitoring, and automation capabilities

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated monitoring of acquisition compliance and contract requirements

new_functions_suggested.description: Automated assessment and monitoring of supply chain risks and vulnerabilities
